name: Popcorn
description: Classic movie snack made from popped corn kernels.

name: Nachos
description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.

name: Soft Pretzel
description: Warm, soft pretzel served with mustard or cheese dip.

name: Hot Dog
description: Grilled sausage served in a bun, often with condiments like ketchup and mustard.

name: Candy (Assorted)
description: Various types of candy including chocolates, gummies, and sour candies.

name: Soda
description: Carbonated soft drinks available in various flavors and sizes.

name: Ice Cream
description: Single scoop or double scoop ice cream cones or cups.
